0: Community_1 has 30 dollars per square meter rent with sports facilities, supermarkets, schools, restaurants, banks but no subway, shopping mall, hospital or park. 3: Community_2 is located at Yongwang Road and is 34$ per square meter with facilities such as Metro, supermarkets, shopping malls, parks, schools, restaurants, and banks. It is green and has a central urban area.
